6.eng-name: The Book of the Times (of Prayer)

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Anas said:"The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) was asked about a man who slept and missed the prayer, or forgot it. He said: 'The expiation for that is to pray it when he remembers it

chapter.eng-name: Concerning One Who Sleeps And Misses A Prayer
